TopicTitle: I think this may be my 1000th post

Articles.Content:
![Noisemaker.jpg](http://johnclaytonsr.com/images/Noisemaker.jpg)

After 2+ years, I have polluted the forum with mudkips, threadlocks, and rambling to such an extent that I now have 1,000 posts. Yay! Interestingly, when I became a mod (May 2014) I had about 250 posts. Being a mod has made me post a lot more, until then I didn't realize how difficult a job moderation is. 

So, I guess onwards to 2K?

Congrats!

You still have my favorite mod avatar.

>tfw I joined only one month after you yet I only have half as many posts

>tfw r4pt0r joined four months after I did yet he has almost four times as many posts than I do and over three times my amount of reputation
Congrats! I learned what a mudkip is because of you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Congratulations! My next post will be my 500th. Trying to write up the BBCode now!
Hehehe... soon you'll realize you've got 2,000 posts, then three thousand, four thousand, at a seemingly accelerating rate.

> 
> Hehehe... soon you'll realize you've got 2,000 posts, then three thousand, four thousand, at a seemingly accelerating rate.

Really? So far, I'm finding it to be more Logarithmic. Then again, maybe I'm just weird, which I am, and that's good. Weird = Good [most of the time]

Yey, congratulations!

Also nice choice of celebration picture!
I think I will be reaching 1000 posts soon too...what has my live become. My goal is to have one of those little light green bars by 1k posts...but whatever.

> 
> Congrats! I learned what a mudkip is because of you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You mean "modkip"? XD

> 
> I recently passed 100.

Neat!

I also recently passed 600 posts after a TON of hard work. When I did, I made sure to tell everyone I knew of my amazing and breathtaking accomplishment.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T02:58:20Z" title="06/27/2015 02:58  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by mythbusters844**
